data.persona: I am the Bishop at the royal court.  The king looks to me for his religious advice.  I was appointed to marry the prince next year.
data.description:
You are in the Beside church pews.
The church pews fill the church as far as the eye can see. They are made of wood, harvested from ancient trees long ago. They gleam with the look of tender love and care, since they are polished after each ceremony.
There's a handle, a wood, a carvings, and two pews here.
The priest is here.

You are carrying nothing.

data.short_motivation: I want to welcome the priest
data.mid_motivation: I plan to teach the priest a lot about my functions today
data.long_motivation: I plan to groom the priest to take my place when I resign in a few months
